mapper.select: select code , category, goods_name, prime_cost, real_price , stock, to_char(writedate , 'yyyy-mm-dd')writedate, sale_state from goods where to_char(writedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')>=#{startDate} and to_char(writedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')<=#{endDate}

select count(*) as cnt from goods join goods_order on goods_order.code = goods.code join orderlist on goods_order.order_code = orderlist.order_code join member on orderlist.userid = member.userid
where goods.category='${category}'
where sale_State='${sale_State}'
where (goods.goods_name like '%${search}%' or goods.category like '%${search}%' or goods.code like '%${search}%')
where sale_State='${sale_State}' and (goods.goods_name like '%${search}%' or goods.category like '%${search}%' or goods.code like '%${search}%' )
where goods.category='${category}' and sale_State='${sale_State}'
where goods.category='${category}' and (goods.goods_name like '%${search}%' or goods.category like '%${search}%' or goods.code like '%${search}%' )
where goods.category='${category}' and sale_State='${sale_State}' and (goods.goods_name like '%${search}%' or goods.category like '%${search}%' or goods.code like '%${search}%')
select goods_img1 from goods where code='${code}'
mapper.update: update goods set goods_img1='${param1}' where code='${param2}'

update goods set category='${category}', goods_name='${goods_name}', prime_cost='${prime_cost}', real_price='${real_price}', sale_state='${sale_state}', stock='${stock}', stack='${stack}', goods_info='${goods_info}', goods_img1='${goods_img1}', goods_img2='${goods_img2}'
where code='${code}'
mapper.insert: insert into goods(code, category, goods_name, prime_cost, real_price, stock, stack, writedate, startdate, enddate, sale_state, goods_info, good, grade, goods_img1, goods_img2) values(#{code}, #{category}, #{goods_name}, #{prime_cost}, ${real_price}, ${stock}, ${stack}, sysdate, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{sale_state}, #{goods_info}, 0, 0, #{goods_img1}, #{goods_img2})
